summary: The programming language and framework used in the project located at ~/workspace/ are not specified. Please provide more details to proceed.

steps.description: List all files and directories in ~/workspace/ to identify project structure.
Detect the primary programming language and framework used in the project based on file extensions and key files.
Identify main source code files relevant to the detected language/framework.
Analyze code for common bugs or issues using static analysis tools or by reviewing recent changes.
Select one specific bug to address and document its location and nature.
Edit the affected file(s) to repair the identified bug.
Test the project to verify that the bug is fixed and no new issues are introduced.
